title: Unemployment rate in Hungary 2019
summary: In general Unemployment rate has fallen over the Year.
The most drastic decrease took place within the Year 2013 and 2014.
Maximum Unemployment rate, about 11.17 was reported at Year 2010
The lowest Unemployment rate, of value 5.12 was reported at Year 2016
min_summary: In general Unemployment rate has fallen over the Year.
